thread.title: Score a huge $420 discount on LG\u0026#8217;s gorgeous 34-inch 160Hz QHD curved gaming monitor, now at $329 (56% off)
thread.title_full: Score a huge $420 discount on LG\u0026#8217;s gorgeous 34-inch 160Hz QHD curved gaming monitor, now at $329 (56% off)

author: Karthik Iyer
title: Score a huge $420 discount on LG\u0026#8217;s gorgeous 34-inch 160Hz QHD curved gaming monitor, now at $329 (56% off)
text: While you can still score Samsung’s stunning 144Hz Odyssey Neo G7 4K gaming monitor for $400 , we just spotted another solid deal on a relatively smaller QHD panel at a wildly low price. Walmart is currently offering LG’s 34-inch 160Hz UltraGear QHD curved gaming monitor down at $329 shipped . That’s straight up a $420 discount on a unit that regularly fetches $749. Only once before today have we seen this model drops below the $400 mark, but it has never been this low. Today’s 56% price drop lands it $70 below its previous all-time low, marking the lowest price we have tracked for it. Head below for more details. The UltraGear 34GN850-B is a curved gaming monitor with a 34-inch QHD Nano IPS panel. It comes with support for up to 160Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time for smooth and responsive gaming, and it also has NVIDIA G-Sync and AMD FreeSync support. Other highlights of this ultra-wide WQHD 21:9 monitor include VESA DisplayHDR 400 certification, a good selection of ports, and a sturdy stand with height adjustment, and more. Samsung’s Odyssey Neo G7 , as we previously mentioned, is still somehow down at its $400 Prime Day price . it sports a bigger 43-inch 4K panel and is down from its usual price of $900. Similar deals on other pieces of gaming gear are waiting for you over at the PC gaming deals hub , so be sure to check them out. LG 34-inch UltraGear 34GN850-B curved gaming monitor features: Step up to more immersive pro-level gaming with the LG 34″ QHD UltraGear Monitor. LG UltraGear Gaming Monitors create a vivid, rich virtual world. Whatever genre you’re into, enjoy picture quality as intense as the game itself, along with ultra-fast response rates. With Black Stabilizer your gameplay is never in the dark. Black Stabilizer is your ally to attack or defend against enemies hiding in the shadows. It delivers a pro-level gaming experience for enhanced vision and a jump on the competition. Built for gamers, it delivers the latest hardware, specs, ergonomics, sleek design and sensory experience. With gaming-focused features like NVIDIA® G-SYNC® compatibility, 1ms GTG response times, pro-level customization and fast, vivid IPS panels, no wonder it’s #1 gaming-designed monitor brand in U.S. FTC: 9to5Toys is reader supported, we may earn income on affiliate links Subscribe to the 9to5Toys YouTube Channel for all of the latest videos, reviews, and more!
